categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The mysterious Yarkora homeworld was located in a star system unknown to the rest of the galactic community, within the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. It remained undiscovered by explorers in the time since the first recorded encounter with a Yarkora, in the year 3 BBY. Xenoscientists speculated that they originated in an arid climate, evolving to become the dominant sentient species of their secret homeworld.

The Yarkora homeworld was mentioned in Ultimate Alien Anthology, a 2003 roleplaying game supplement written by Eric Cagle, Cory J. Herndon, Michael Mikaelian, Steve Miller, Owen K.C. Stephens, and J.D. Wiker for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
